verses.verse: Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>scroll.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H4100>"What<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%>?" And I <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>scroll;<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H423>curse<s%> that is <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H1589>steals<s%> will be <S%H5352>purged<s%> away according to the writing on <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side,<s%> and <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H7650>swears<s%> will be <S%H5352>purged<s%> away according to the writing on the other <S%H2088>side.<s%>

"I will make it <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "and it will <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1590>thief<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the one who <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by My <S%H8034>name;<s%> and it will <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> that <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> it with its <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H68>stones.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5375>"Lift<s%> up <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is, <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>"

And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is it?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>" Again he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is their <S%H5869>appearance<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>

(and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H5777>lead<s%> <S%H3603>cover<s%> was <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up); and <S%H2088>this<s%> is a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H374>ephah.<s%> "

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H7564>Wickedness!<s%>" And he <S%H7993>threw<s%> her <S%H7993>down<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H5777>lead<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%> on its <S%H6310>opening.<s%>

Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and there <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> were <S%H3318>coming<s%> out with the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in their <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and they had <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and they <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
And I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me, <S%H575>"Where<s%> are they <S%H1980>taking<s%> the <S%H374>ephah<s%>?"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "To <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>temple<s%> for her in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar;<s%> and when it is <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> she will be <S%H5117>set<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on her own <S%H4350>pedestal.<s%>"
